citation: Proclamation under the Teachers Registration Act 2000 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Teachers Registration Act 2000

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Teachers Registration Act 2000 , fix 1 January 2002 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

10 December 2001

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

FRAN BLADEL

Minister for Education

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 19 December 2001

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Education.
